articles.description: Share If you like it Some 36 per cent of this rise in sea level was due to ice loss from glaciers in Greenland and Antarctica. Representative Photo: iStock. In 2022, 58 per cent of the ocean surface suffered at least one marine heatwave event and 25 per cent …
articles.content: In 2022, 58 per cent of the ocean surface suffered at least one marine heatwave event and 25 per cent of the surface experienced at least one marine cold spell, stated the State of the Global Climate… [+4388 chars]
